channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-5879] Fix problems in English messages disclosed by a localization audit.
item.description:
The team which is localizing the 10.9 messages would like to audit our existing messages to ensure that they are easy to translate. A quick glance at their audit results shows many issues in the following categories:

1) Multi-line messages whose formatting confuses the translators. Translators tend to be language experts and not experts in the arcana of how Java properties files are formatted. I am hoping that these issues can be addressed by simply prefixing the multi-line messages with comments, explaining the arcane formatting.

2) Grammar, punctuation, and capitalization problems. I think we should just clean these up.

I am filing this issue as a place to hold patches which address issues raised by the localization audit.
item.summary: Fix problems in English messages disclosed by a localization audit.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Attaching derby-5879-01-aa-multiLineToolsMessages.diff. This patch improves the translatability of multi-line messages produced by the Derby tools. 3 tests had diffs and needed to be adjusted. Committed at subversion revision 1365672.

This patch makes the following changes:

1) Adds header comments to the multi-line tools messages. Hopefully, these will be good enough to tell the translators what needs to be translated and what doesn't.

2) Changes a couple of words from ALL CAPS to ordinary casing. By default, the translators ignore anything which is in ALL CAPS, assuming that those words are command keywords which don't change from locale to locale. Changing the casing of these particular words did not seem to me to affect the reading or impact of the messages. That is, I did not see any reason to SHOUT these particular words at the user.

Touches the following files:

--------

M java/tools/org/apache/derby/loc/toolsmessages.properties

Message changes.

--------

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/tools/derbyrunjartest.java
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/dblook_test_territory.out
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/dblook_test.out

Corresponding changes to canonized message output.

Attaching derby-5879-02-aa-MessageIdmessages.diff. This patch mostly fixes problems in messages whose codes appear in MessageId. These are mostly capitalization errors. I have adjusted canonized results so that the tests run cleanly.

Besides the capitalization errors, I also fixed a Store message (MessageId.STORE_BOOT_MSG). This message involved appending a clause to the end of another message. This is the sort of message concatenation which can be awkward for localization. I replaced the appended clause with a separate message: MessageId.STORE_BOOT_MSG_READ_ONLY.

Touches the following files:

--------------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/messages.xml
M java/shared/org/apache/derby/shared/common/reference/MessageId.java

Actual changes to messages.

--------------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/impl/store/raw/data/BaseDataFileFactory.java

Needed to adjust the code which was concatenating two independently localized strings.

--------------

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/lang/ErrorCodeTest.java
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/GetPropertyInfoTest.out

Changes to canonized message text in the tests.
Committed derby-5879-02-aa-MessageIdmessages.diff at subversion revision 1366362.

Attaching derby-5879-03-aa-SQLStatemessages.diff. This patch makes various changes to messages in messages.xml with sql states in SQLState.java. I am running regression tests now.

Changes are mostly of these types:

1) Correcting capitalization and punctuation.

2) Removing unused messages.

3) Adding comments for translators.

I also corrected the capitalization of one message in toolsmessages.properties.

Touches the following files:

--------------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/messages.xml
M java/shared/org/apache/derby/shared/common/reference/SQLState.java
M java/tools/org/apache/derby/loc/toolsmessages.properties

Corrections to message files.

--------------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/iapi/sql/dictionary/DefaultDescriptor.java

Removed an instance of inserting one localized string into another.

--------------

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/lang/ErrorCodeTest.java

Corrected canonized results.
Tests passed cleanly for me on derby-5879-03-aa-SQLStatemessages.diff. Committed at subversion revision 1367610.

Attaching derby-5879-04-aa-DRDAmessages.diff. This patch fixes some capitalization problems and string concatenation problems in the DRDA messages. I am running regression tests now.

Touches the following file:

M java/drda/org/apache/derby/loc/drda/messages_en.properties
Tests passed cleanly for me on derby-5879-04-aa-DRDAmessages.diff. Committed at subversion revision 1367691.

Attaching derby-5879-05-aa-commentArguments.diff. This patch make various changes to message files and their users. I am running regression tests now.

Most changes fall into the following categories:

1) Add comments to messages for translators.

2) Delete unused messages.

3) Fix combinations of independently localized messages.

Touches the following files:

----------

M java/tools/org/apache/derby/loc/toolsmessages.properties
M java/drda/org/apache/derby/loc/drda/messages_en.properties
M java/drda/org/apache/derby/loc/drda/servlet_en.properties

Message changes.

----------

M java/tools/org/apache/derby/impl/tools/ij/ijException.java
M java/drda/org/apache/derby/impl/drda/NetworkServerControlImpl.java

Corresponding changes to calling code.

The previous patch tripped some errors in the regression tests. Attaching a revised patch to address those errors: derby-5879-05-ab-commentArguments.diff.

Touches two additional test canons:

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/xaOffline1.out
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/encryptDatabaseTest2.out

Committed at subversion revision 1367985.

Attaching derby-5879-06-aa-doNotTranslate.diff. This patch addresses issues with message strings which should not be translated, and with strings which should be translated but which appear as untranslatable literals to the translators. I am running regression tests now.

In general, the translators think that they should not translate words which appear in ALL CAPS or camelCase. This convention is not unique to this team of translators but appears to have been observed by some (but not all) previous translators of the Derby messages, as can be seen by inspecting the current localizations.

Changes made by this patch fall into the following major categories:

1) Conversion between ALL CAPS and regular casing.

2) Conversion between camelCase and regular casing.

3) Addition of comments.

4) Deletion of unused messages.

Touches the following files:

----------

M java/tools/org/apache/derby/loc/toolsmessages.properties
M java/tools/org/apache/derby/loc/sysinfoMessages.properties
M java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/messages.xml
M java/shared/org/apache/derby/shared/common/reference/SQLState.java
M java/drda/org/apache/derby/loc/drda/messages_en.properties

Changes to English messages.

----------

Corresponding changes to code which uses the changed messages.

----------

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/lang/ErrorCodeTest.java
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/tools/derbyrunjartest.java
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/tools/SysinfoCPCheckTest.java
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/derbynet/NetworkServerControlApiTest.java
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/positionedDelUpd.out

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/dblook_test.out

Attaching derby-5879-06-ab-doNotTranslate.diff. This patch fixes another canonized result in the regression tests. Committed at subversion revision 1369173.

Touches an additional file:

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/dbManagerLimits.out

Attaching derby-5879-07-aa-commentQueryPlanStrings.diff. This patch adds comments to the query plan messages. The comments tell the translators that the strings are complete even though they look like the kind of string fragments which might cause concatenation problems when localized. Committed at subversion revision 1369831.

Touches the following file:

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/messages.xml

Attaching derby-5879-08-aa-explainContext.diff. This makes various changes to the messages to clarify the context which translators need to do their job. Tests pass cleanly for me. Committed at subversion revision 1369889.

Changes mostly fall into the following categories:

1) Comments added to messages.

2) String fragments replaced with hardcoded, non-translatable literals.

Touches the following files:

Attaching derby-5879-09-aa-spelling.diff. This fixes some capitalization and spelling errors in the English messages. I am running tests now.

Touches the following files:

Attaching derby-5879-09-ab-spelling.diff. This patch fixes canons for two tests which failed with the previous rev of the patch. Committed at subversion revision 1369949.

Touches the following additional files:

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/refActions2.out
M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/master/GetPropertyInfoTest.out

Since revision 1369173 the test lang/outparams.java is failing for weme6.2 (an implementation of j2ME/CDC/Foundation profile). This is because the master for this test was changed, but not the canon for j9_foundation.

Attaching patch derby-5879-j9_f_outparams.diff that fixes up this canon. It makes the same changes to master/j9_foundation/outparams.out as 1369173 to master/outparams.out; i.e. changing "datetime" to "date/time" in 78 places. I will commit shortly.
committed patch derby-5879-j9_f_outparams.diff with revision: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=1370023
Thanks, Myrna. There may be some other canons which need updating for j9.

Attaching derby-5879-10-aa-deleteUnused.diff. This patch deletes an unused message fragment. Committed at subversion revision 1370266.

Touches the following files:

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/messages.xml
M java/shared/org/apache/derby/shared/common/reference/SQLState.java

Attaching derby-5879-11-aa-deleteUntranslatable.diff. This patch deletes some untranslatable message fragments which are just the names of SQL schema object types. I am running regression tests now.

Touches the following files:

----------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/messages.xml
M java/shared/org/apache/derby/shared/common/reference/SQLState.java

Removed messages.

----------

Tests passed cleanly on derby-5879-11-aa-deleteUntranslatable.diff. Committed at subversion revision 1370897.
setting sql component, don't know anything better for message changes. really likely affects all components.
Is there any remaining work on this issue, or can it be resolved?
Thanks for the nudge, Knut. Resolving.
